title: Polite Yanks (Soviet cartoon, 1952)
Text: Polite Yanks. Top right text  ‘In the French town of Le Mans the supply of milk was reduced 50% because the American occupation troops are the first to get dairy products’ Bottom text  ‘ — This is to the health of your children, Madame!’ Bottles  ‘Milk’ and ‘cream’.
Additional Information: Shows an American soldier downing all of France’s milk while Marianne and her children are left empty-handed, with a Coca Cola advert behind.
